channel.title: Need A VPS? Packages From £4.99 - 10% Donation to SCAR
channel.description:
Hi everyone, If your currently looking for a VPS (virtual private server), and want to support the development of SCAR, then this is for you! Simply mention SCAR in the order notes when ordering your VPS and 10% of the total order value will go straight to Freddy1990, supporting the continued development! - This has been approved by mopar.
[b]Serverax Ltd[/b] www.serverax.co.uk
Serverax is a UK based company specialising in virtualized IT Services. We provide quality, 100% UK based virtual private servers at competitive prices. We only use the highest quality hardware in all of our servers, combined with industry leading hypervisor and management software
========================= [b]Autumn Deals At Serverax[/b] =========================
FREE Double Diskspace! - For the duration of your account!
When ordering, just enter the promotional code:
[b]VPSDISKX2[/b]
=========================
Get 3 Months For The Price Of 2! - Applies to quaterly billing cycle only
When ordering, just enter the promotional code:
[b]VPS3FOR2[/b]
========================= [b]VPS Packages[/b] =========================
- Remember, you get DOUBLE the disk space listed below if you use the promotional code above!
Value (VPS-128)
* Dedicated RAM: 128MB * HDD Allocation: 5GB * Bandwidth: 150GB
£4.99 Monthly
Bronze (VPS-256)
* Dedicated RAM: 256MB * HDD Allocation: 15GB * Bandwidth: 300GB
£9.99 Monthly
Silver (VPS-384)
* Dedicated RAM: 384MB * HDD Allocation: 25GB * Bandwidth: 600GB
£12.99 Monthly
Gold (VPS-512)
* Dedicated RAM: 512MB * HDD Allocation: 35GB * Bandwidth: 800GB
£16.99 Monthly
========================= [b]Info On All VPS Packages[/b] =========================
* 100Mbit internet connection. * Free, unlimited reboots. * Free, unlimited reformats. * 1 IP addresses included, another free of charge when justified. * Additional IP addresses are available for £0.50 each. * Access to HyperVM control panel for managing your VPS. * Allocated swap is double the amount of allocated RAM.
========================= [b]Datacentre & Network Infrastructure[/b] =========================
All of our servers are located in the Bluesquare Datacenter, Maidenhead, UK. BlueSquare operates multiple carrier neutral data centres in the UK, and is one of the very few that is not reliant on London, therefore providing excellent resilience.
Source: bluesquaredata.com
* Over 50,000 sq ft of space * 8 megawatt of power from multiple on-site substations * Diverse power feeds to substations * Multiple redundant N+N generators connected via C&N * ATS systems * Diverse fibre ducts into the datacentres * N+1 PowerWave UPS system * N+1 Airedale Air Handling system * 22°C +/- 2°C data floor temperature * 24x7 secure entry via swipe card system, with 6-layer entry * Datacentre located inside its own secure compound, with 3-metre fencing and electric entry, including anti-tailgate systems * Engineers available 24x7 for remote hands service
Provided by our sister company, BlueConnex, we run a fully redundant BGP network consisting of two separate hardware vendors which provides redundancy not only in the network level, but also on the hardware level.
We operate two separate 10Gigabit networks, from both Extreme Networks and Foundry Networks at all locations. On top of this layer 2 network we operate two independent IP Transit networks (AS29550 and AS34920) which run from multiple Cisco Systems 7606-S RSP720 and 6509 SUP720 routers at multiple London facilities, offering true redundancy to each customer.
Connecting with multiple Tier 1 providers, as well the London Internet Exchange (LINX), we are the only provider able to offer IP services diverse of London, to any of the BlueSquare datacentre customers.
Ping Test IP: 92.48.127.210 20mb Test File: 20mb.bin
========================= [b]FAQs[/b] =========================
Do you allow IRC?
* We do not allow any IRC services to be hosted on our network.
========================= [b]Next Steps[/b] =========================
If you would like to order one of our packages, or require further information about our company, or any of our services you can visit our website at www.serverax.co.uk, or email our sales team at sales(@)serverax.co.uk
Thankyou for your time, we look forward to hearing from you

item.title: Need A VPS? Packages From £4.99 - 10% Donation to SCAR
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:24, topic:241374”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=317705.msg2799025#msg2799025 date=1243259376]

Uh what? The rs servers are written in Java…

Yes I know that, but I’ve been told that from some people over msn, some methods of java are OS independent?

I suppose they’re idiots?

Java is OS independent…
[/quote]
I misunderstood then, i thought independent as in “single”[/quote]
No, it means it works on any platform the virtual machine has been developed on.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:19, topic:241374”][quote author=Kyle_Dibiase link=topic=317705.msg2794656#msg2794656 date=1242998611]
how is it false, its a horrible choice to use a linux server.

lets say you want to host a game server, o whops linux VPS can’t do that
better off paying $40 a month for a windows one
[/quote]

Uh, what decent game dosent have a linux server?[/quote]
Moparscape, oh wait, thats not decent.

Linux VPS > Window VPS

Linux is much cheaper (compare the prices of the vps hosting to other sites).
Linux is much faster, and a bit harder to use (in a “noob’s view”).

Linux is good for web hosting, game hosting, etc, - except moparscape?

Anyways, I’m thinking of getting one of theses.

Read full topic

item.title: Need A VPS? Packages From £4.99 - 10% Donation to SCAR
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

USMC:

It’s very unlikely everyone will be using 100% of their share at the same time, so there will always be CPU time available… and it’s worked well so far

You would hope so, but i wouldnt like to rely upon it!

Read full topic
item.source: Need A VPS? Packages From £4.99 - 10% Donation to SCAR

item.title: Need A VPS? Packages From £4.99 - 10% Donation to SCAR
item.dc:creator: @USMC USMC
item.description:
@USMC wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:241374”]“Unlike some other providers, we do not overload our servers, each customer is allocated a dedicated amount of physical resources.”

How are you applying that to CPU usage? Couldn’t find any info on the site. Cheers.[/quote]

It applies to both CPU and RAM,

Due to the nature of Xen, it’s physically impossible to oversell RAM since its a physical resource that is assigned to each DomU.

CPU is shared, customers are allocated 10% CPU usage, split between all 4 cores. Then an extra 5% usage for each package as you go up the list.

It’s very unlikely everyone will be using 100% of their share at the same time, so there will always be CPU time available… and it’s worked well so far

  • Some other providers add so much RAM to their servers in proportion to the CPU(s), this helps them save money as they can fit more people into one server, therefore dont have to pay costs on additional servers… We don’t do that Each server is designed proportionally so everyone will have enough processing power

Hope that answers your question, cheers.

Read full topic
item.source: Need A VPS? Packages From £4.99 - 10% Donation to SCAR

item.title: Need A VPS? Packages From £4.99 - 10% Donation to SCAR
item.dc:creator: @USMC USMC
item.description:
@USMC wrote:

Hi everyone,
If your currently looking for a VPS (virtual private server), and want to support the development of SCAR, then this is for you!
Simply mention SCAR in the order notes when ordering your VPS and 10% of the total order value will go straight to Freddy1990, supporting the continued development!

  • This has been approved by mopar.

Serverax Ltd
www.serverax.co.uk

Serverax is a UK based company specialising in virtualized IT Services.
We provide quality, 100% UK based virtual private servers at competitive prices.
We only use the highest quality hardware in all of our servers, combined with industry leading hypervisor and management software

=========================
Autumn Deals At Serverax

FREE Double Diskspace!

  • For the duration of your account!

When ordering, just enter the promotional code:

VPSDISKX2

=========================

Get 3 Months For The Price Of 2!

  • Applies to quaterly billing cycle only

When ordering, just enter the promotional code:

VPS3FOR2

=========================
VPS Packages

  • Remember, you get DOUBLE the disk space listed below if you use the promotional code above!

Value (VPS-128)

* Dedicated RAM: 128MB
* HDD Allocation: 5GB
* Bandwidth: 150GB

£4.99 Monthly

Bronze (VPS-256)

* Dedicated RAM: 256MB
* HDD Allocation: 15GB
* Bandwidth: 300GB

£9.99 Monthly

Silver (VPS-384)

* Dedicated RAM: 384MB
* HDD Allocation: 25GB
* Bandwidth: 600GB

£12.99 Monthly

Gold (VPS-512)

* Dedicated RAM: 512MB
* HDD Allocation: 35GB
* Bandwidth: 800GB

£16.99 Monthly

=========================
Info On All VPS Packages 

* 100Mbit internet connection.
* Free, unlimited reboots.
* Free, unlimited reformats.
* 1 IP addresses included, another free of charge when justified.
* Additional IP addresses are available for £0.50 each.
* Access to HyperVM control panel for managing your VPS.
* Allocated swap is double the amount of allocated RAM.

=========================
Datacentre & Network Infrastructure

All of our servers are located in the Bluesquare Datacenter, Maidenhead, UK.
BlueSquare operates multiple carrier neutral data centres in the UK, and is one of the very few that is not reliant on London, therefore providing excellent resilience.

Source: bluesquaredata.com

* Over 50,000 sq ft of space
* 8 megawatt of power from multiple on-site substations
* Diverse power feeds to substations
* Multiple redundant N+N generators connected via C&N
* ATS systems
* Diverse fibre ducts into the datacentres
* N+1 PowerWave UPS system
* N+1 Airedale Air Handling system
* 22°C +/- 2°C data floor temperature
* 24x7 secure entry via swipe card system, with 6-layer entry
* Datacentre located inside its own secure compound, with 3-metre fencing and electric entry, including anti-tailgate systems
* Engineers available 24x7 for remote hands service

Provided by our sister company, BlueConnex, we run a fully redundant BGP network consisting of two separate hardware vendors which provides redundancy not only in the network level, but also on the hardware level.

We operate two separate 10Gigabit networks, from both Extreme Networks and Foundry Networks at all locations. On top of this layer 2 network we operate two independent IP Transit networks (AS29550 and AS34920) which run from multiple Cisco Systems 7606-S RSP720 and 6509 SUP720 routers at multiple London facilities, offering true redundancy to each customer.

Connecting with multiple Tier 1 providers, as well the London Internet Exchange (LINX), we are the only provider able to offer IP services diverse of London, to any of the BlueSquare datacentre customers.

Ping Test IP: 92.48.127.210
20mb Test File: 20mb.bin

=========================
FAQs

Do you allow IRC?

* We do not allow any IRC services to be hosted on our network.

=========================
Next Steps

If you would like to order one of our packages, or require further information about our company, or any of our services you can visit our website at www.serverax.co.uk, or email our sales team at sales(@)serverax.co.uk

Thankyou for your time, we look forward to hearing from you

Read full topic
